checkPoints.message: Given user is on the landinPage and selects close signup
Then is user in on the homepage and searches for 'ipad'
Then user sorts the produts in low to high price order
Then user selects the prdouct from the list of available products

subCheckPoints.message:
Expected: a value greater than <0>
     Actual: <3> was greater than <0>

checkPoints.message: Then user adds the product to its  cart

subCheckPoints.message:
product Name verification
Expected: a string containing "Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi Only"
     Actual: was "Apple iPad 32 GB 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi Only (Space Grey)"
